duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, organize, staff, and direct functions to ensure the effective operation of the unit.
Develop plans, policies, and procedures to efficiently provide quality care.
Support and work with the leadership team to develop plans and procedures.
Provide dedicated patient care and make a difference in the lives of patients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree required; Master’s Degree preferred
Licensed as a Registered Nurse in the State which you practice or must hold Compact/Multi-State RN License
Current BLS and ACLS from American Heart Association (AHA or American Red Cross) are required
